Text:
Extends standard Age of Empires 4 game mode with options known from previous games.

Additional features included in current version of the mod:
Win Conditions
- Regicide
Match Options
- Nomad
- Last Age
- Game Speed
- Population Capacity
Fun Options
- Spawn King
- Spawn Keep


Source code, feedback, bug reports or contribution to mode can be done at: https://github.com/ W o p r o k /AOE4-AdvancedGameSettings
